title: This DHS Memo Is Terrifying (Ep 1702)
description:
The latest DHS memo is an overt attack on our Rights. In this episode I address the memo, and the potential ramifications. 

News Picks:


What is the “blue stack”? And how do they work together to censor free speech?

Leaked email suggests there was a plot to get warrants against unmasked students. 


A frightening DHS bulletin emerges. 


The boycott beatings will continue until the right imposes costs for cancellation attempts.
